articles.title: Govt brings ordinance for pre-packaged insolvency resolution of MSMEs under IBC - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The ordinance aims to make insolvency resolution easier, faster and cost-effective for MSMEs using the ‘pre-pack’ process. It will act as an efficient alternative insolvency resolution process for MSMES under the IBC.
